org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.date
Class AbstractDateUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.date.AbstractDateUtil
Direct Known Subclasses:
MeeusDateUtil
public abstract class AbstractDateUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class is the base for classes that need to convert between Julian Day and Calendar Date.
